name: Notion Travel Planner Template
description: Research. Prepare. Explore. Reflect. The Ultimate Travel Planner: Your personal travel companion.Streamline your travel planning with this Notion template. Designed with the modern traveller in mind, here's what you can expect:Itinerary Database: Keep your itinerary organized and accessible so you can keep on top of all your plans. Keep track of resources, see which sites are close together and share your itinerary easily. Packing list and pre-travel checklist: All the travel essentials to check
features: Itinerary Database: Keep your itinerary organized and accessible so you can keep on top of all your plans. Keep track of resources, see which sites are close together and share your itinerary easily.; Packing list and pre-travel checklist: All the travel essentials to check before you walk out the front door; Accommodation Database: Say goodbye to sifting through emails by keeping all your accommodation information in one place. Keep track of payments and compare hotel prices.; Food diary: Document your culinary journey with the built-in food diary. Note down memorable dining experiences and even attach photos of your delectable meals.
